author: A_Brickset_user
title: The best sculpture I think
review: I like free fantasy sculptures much more than sculptures of actual things since building the last is more a question of technique than creativeness. And this dragon is extremely cute, fun to build and gives a lot of green bricks to use for other things if you can bare to take the dragon apart!

author: kmitchell
title: Instructions should be freely available!
review:
There should be more sculptures available for purchase. I live in Australia and have never had the chance to purchase this from a shop.  Thanks to this website I am finally able to get a copy of the instructions and then buy the bricks from LEGO to create it!
This is the only place on the web that has the instructions, thankyou so.. much!

author: Caliche2735
title: Awesome
review: We have this set and are parting with it new in box on e bay marketit's one of the most collectible sets that was ever made and its hard to come by the parts to free build, it's got over 1500 parts and still in sealed boxes. My son was given it at birth and it sat on a shelf for 12 years. Bought direct from the Lego store.
